alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, southwestern St. Louis and northwestern Carlton Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malmo, or 9 miles east of Mille Lacs Lake, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, McGregor and Tamarack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
